Name: Kentucky Muffin
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. (Or reduce sugar syrup to 10ml (1/3oz) and serve over cubed ice.)
Review: Blueberries, lime and apple combine with and are fortified by bourbon.
History: Created in 2000 at Mash, London, England.
